generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings, extending into the distance, which is characteristic of a road.
- sidewalk: There are sidewalks on both sides of the road, clearly separated from the road by curbs and bordered by trees or fences.

- fence: A metal fence runs along the right side of the sidewalk, separating it from a grassy area.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including one with traffic signs attached near the center-right of the image.
- traffic sign: A triangular traffic sign with a black border and a white background is mounted on a pole on the right side of the road.
- vegetation: Numerous trees with green foliage are present along both sides of the road and in the background.
- terrain: A grassy area is visible behind the fence on the right side of the road.
- person: A man is walking on the sidewalk on the right side of the road, and another person is visible further down the sidewalk on the left side.
- car: Several cars are parked along the side of the road, including a silver car on the left and a red car further down the road.
- bicycle: A person is riding a bicycle on the sidewalk on the left side of the road.
